body: Now that it appears former Google CEO Eric Schmidt's end of tenure began with split views between him and founders Larry Page and Sergey Brin over the company's future in China, what, asks raventhorn2000 at Hidden Harmonies, comes next?
original_body: Now that it appears former Google CEO Eric Schmidt's end of tenure began with split views between him and founders Larry Page and Sergey Brin over the company's future in China, what, asks raventhorn2000 at Hidden Harmonies, comes next?
title: China: Waiting for Google's next move

sentence: Now that it appears former Google CEO Eric Schmidt's end of tenure began with split views between him and founders Larry Page and Sergey Brin over the company's future in China, what, asks raventhorn2000 at Hidden Harmonies, comes next?
